description: Eznkay Koghbats'woy Bagrewanday episkoposi Eghts Aghandots' [ Against the Sects by Eznik of Koghb, Bishop of Bagrewand Eznkay Koghbats'woy Bagrewanday episkoposi Eghts Aghandots' [ Against the Sects by Eznik of Koghb, Bishop of Bagrewand ] (Venice, 1826), in 352 pdf pages. Written c. 445/448. Occasional duplicate pages in the scan. Includes some additional writings attributed to Eznik. File size: 4.4 MB. Eghishe'i vardapeti matenagrut'iwnk' [Writings of Eghishe' Vardapet]

is_part_of.title: Online Armenian Catalogs, Philosophical, Patristic, and Theological Materials

title: Eznkay Koghbats'woy Bagrewanday episkoposi Eghts Aghandots' [Against the Sects by Eznik of Koghb, Bishop of Bagrewand
